r.s: Singletons, retries and transactions, oh my
r.d: A simple PDO wrapper that adds singletons, retries and improved transaction support.
r.n: * Added RETRY_DEADLOCKS flag-- when it's true, we will retry deadlocked queries. * Converted Exception to PDOException * Reduced and simplified warnings relating to retries. We now log only if the first reconnect fails. Previously we retried prior to the first reconnection attempt if we had previously reconnected. * Changed retryable exception detection to use only on the error number. * Correctly throw calls to invalid methods on PDO_STH * Allow RETRIES and RETRY_DEADLOCKS to be overridden on calls to ->execute * Improved test suite with nearly 100% coverage
